title: White House and governors pressure grid operator to boost power supply, slow electricity price hikes
description: The Trump administration and 13 governors urged PJM Interconnection to boost power supplies and limit electricity costs amid rising demand.
content: The Trump administration and 13 governors urged PJM Interconnection to boost power supplies and limit electricity costs amid rising demand.
